channel.title: Requesting Team for 667 server!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, Let me formally introduce myself. My name is Chris A.K.A Fairs and I'm Canadian, Eh! I have been working on a project and I wanted to make a team to help develop with me. I've seen some pretty nasty unorganized servers and some pretty irresponsible staff and quite frankly, getting quite tired of it. So I decided I would make this project and see how it goes.
I'm looking for roughly 2-4 more people, as I have already recruited someone with some coding knowledge (Jared). He is willing to be apart of the TEAM. Unfortunately I haven't really tried, so here I am. You do not have to expertise in Java coding because your suggestion matters, as long as you're not "Put that wall there, can I be staff now?" No. We mean legitimately help us throughout development, give us strong ideas and some opinions.
The server I have created will simply not be a PK Server, There will be some I can imagine, but I was thinking along the lines of an economy server, Well balanced and not "Donate" to win. I am not looking for a one person overpowered dictatorship. HEIL. just kidding, anyways. I will be personally paying for the server out of my own pocket.
Requirements are: Skype and a mic
Recommended: Understanding of Java coding Patience
Skype: vChris36

item.title: Requesting Team for 667 server!
item.dc:creator: @Fairs Fairs
item.description:
@Fairs wrote:

Hello everyone, Let me formally introduce myself. My name is Chris A.K.A Fairs and I’m Canadian, Eh! I have been working on a project and I wanted to make a team to help develop with me. I’ve seen some pretty nasty unorganized servers and some pretty irresponsible staff and quite frankly, getting quite tired of it. So I decided I would make this project and see how it goes.

I’m looking for roughly 2-4 more people, as I have already recruited someone with some coding knowledge (Jared). He is willing to be apart of the TEAM. Unfortunately I haven’t really tried, so here I am. You do not have to expertise in Java coding because your suggestion matters, as long as you’re not “Put that wall there, can I be staff now?” No. We mean legitimately help us throughout development, give us strong ideas and some opinions.

The server I have created will simply not be a PK Server, There will be some I can imagine, but I was thinking along the lines of an economy server, Well balanced and not “Donate” to win. I am not looking for a one person overpowered dictatorship. HEIL. just kidding, anyways. I will be personally paying for the server out of my own pocket.

Requirements are:
Skype and a mic

Recommended:
Understanding of Java coding
Patience

Skype:
vChris36
